alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 7:49PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch at lower elevations, but up to 2 inches are possible in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on ice and snow covered roads. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to less than one mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This warning is mainly for areas along the Idaho and Wyoming borders.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
